Method.name: BuildStatus
Method.Description: Builds a %Status from the combined input. Message is converted to a GeneralError %Status; if Status is passed-in, it is appended to it. Intended usage is to prefix extra information to an error status returned from a system call, through the $$$BuildStatus macro.
Method.Implementation:
;Replace placeholders with content, if present If $Get(Args) Set Message = ##class(Strix.Lib.String).TemplateReplace(Message, Args...)
;Convert message to %Status Set MsgStatus = $System.Status.Error($$$GeneralError, Message)
;Append status from parameter, if specified If Status '= "" Set MsgStatus = $System.Status.AppendStatus(MsgStatus, Status)
Quit MsgStatus
